entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 7:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
